game_description: Welcome to the Knockout League, a single player arcade style boxing game built from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Its intuitive gameplay involves moving and dodging with your body and 1:1 punch movement that lets you attack how you want without relying on buttons for main gameplay. Train up with various boxing drills to take on a crazy cast of characters with different fighting styles and gameplay in order to become the champion of the Knockout League! Oculus Cross-Buy enabled!

review_2: As soon as I started playing the game, I just felt that the quality was going to be good. It did catch me a little to understand how the game works, but as soon as I started fighting the 1st guy, I started to understand the game a little bit more. I did find that it was a big jump from the 1st guy to the 2nd opponent. I tried going into training mode to see if would show me how to block the opponent's hits because it never taught it So I ended up looking it up on YouTube and as soon as I saw What to do on all the fights I suddenly caught on And started winning
review_3: I love this game it is a very good workout. Fun to play love it!

What I like best is that it‚Äôs not something to take serious like your more realistic boxing vr games. This is a great workout for those who could use a little help in the cardio department.
